Package com.opera.core.systems

Provides OperaDriver and associated classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
OperaArguments  
OperaDesktopDriver An extension of OperaDriver for testing the interface of the Opera desktop browser.
OperaDriver OperaDriver is an implementation of the WebDriver interface that allows you to drive the Opera web browser.
OperaKeyboard Opera uses the "exec" Scope service to trigger key events in Opera.
OperaMouse  
OperaPaths This class tries to find the paths to Opera and the launcher on any system.
OperaProfile OperaProfile is an interface representing a profile (commonly a profile directory) for the Opera web browser.
OperaUIElement OperaUIElement
OperaWebElement Implements WebDriver's WebElement, but also extends it with Opera specific methods.
QuickMenu Represents a menu in the Opera desktop UI.
QuickMenuItem Represents a menuitem in a menu in the Opera desktop UI.
QuickWidget Represents a widget in the Opera desktop UI.
QuickWindow Represents a window in the Desktop UI.
ScopeServices Implements the interface to the Scope protocol.
WaitState This class handles a queue of events to be handled from multiple threads.
 

Enum Summary
OperaAtoms The WebDriver atoms are used to ensure consistent behaviour cross-browser.
OperaDriver.PrivateData Different types of data stored by Opera.
OperaProduct A list of all Opera products.
QuickWidget.DropPosition  
 

Package com.opera.core.systems Description

Provides OperaDriver and associated classes.
